about_the_game:
A day after the original game's events, King Bearton is BACK with his new plan to take the Rhythm Knights out once and for all.



The first game was not so hot... so this time, we brought the heat! The Rhythm Knights are back with all-new features! Rhythm Knights: Double Treble is a 2-4 key story-based rhythm game containing over 20 Levels! 7 of which are from Rhythm Knights: Reharmonized, the remastered release of the first classic which is included for free!



When the trouble is double, you know who to call.

CREDITS:
Dallen Larson - Director & Programmer
ZachJaDa - Artist
Noobstack - Music
Umbre - Guest Artist for Extra Pixels Level
detailed_description:
Check This Out!!!


About the Game

A day after the original game's events, King Bearton is BACK with his new plan to take the Rhythm Knights out once and for all.



The first game was not so hot... so this time, we brought the heat! The Rhythm Knights are back with all-new features! Rhythm Knights: Double Treble is a 2-4 key story-based rhythm game containing over 20 Levels! 7 of which are from Rhythm Knights: Reharmonized, the remastered release of the first classic which is included for free!



When the trouble is double, you know who to call.

CREDITS:
Dallen Larson - Director & Programmer
ZachJaDa - Artist
Noobstack - Music
Umbre - Guest Artist for Extra Pixels Level

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 or higher required
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz P4, Dual Core 2.0 (or higher) or AMD64X2 (or higher)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4850, NVIDIA GeForce GT 120, Intel HD 3000, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAMNVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, Intel HD 3000, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 709 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Support for OpenGL 2.1
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: El Capitan 10.11
  • Processor: Intel Core i series processor
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460, AMD Radeon HD 6850, or equivalent card with at least 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 709 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, Intel HD 3000, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 709 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 Screen Resolution is recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 10240.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo at 2.2 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 2.2Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460, AMD Radeon HD 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 709 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 Screen Resolution is recommended.

short_description: Play as the Rhythm Knights in this hand-drawn colorful rhythm fighter reimagining. Featuring tons of levels and a brand new input system. This package also contains a full remastered version of the original game! This is the ultimate Rhythm Knights package!
